about_the_game:
Although it's just a simple game of catching gold, it requires cultivating your patience early on. Watch the swaying hook twist to the appropriate angle, quickly, accurately, and fiercely lower the hook. The hook is like the hand of the God of Wealth, stirring the heartstrings of every player! Of course, during the process of catching gold, there will be layers of obstacles, and players must achieve the goals of each level in order to enter deeper mines! In addition, this game also provides a wealth of props. When you encounter levels that you have been unable to pass, you can buy some small props in the game mall.

↓ Place the hook

1. Attractive high-definition image quality, reinterpreting classic casual game works;

2. Reviewing classics, extreme challenges, mobile gold mining, and a plethora of innovative gameplay await you to battle;

3. Various interesting props can help you pass levels and uncover mysterious treasures.
